lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks, Travis. So tonight we'll kick off here with some announcements. First and foremost, the first run with Loot Crate went very well; you guys rose up and showed your interest in that fantastic product and they've come back! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put the stank down! Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (airhorn sounds) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's wonderful. So yeah, so those of you guys who are tuning into this wonderful offer for the first time, they are offering a $3 subscription-- the word escapes me for some reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Discount.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Discount, that's the word, because my brain is stuck in fantasy mode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Discount code. I love that you called it a modifier!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He said "modifier." That was Travis on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jock said modifier, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minus $3 modifier to your Critical Role subscription for Loot Crate. But no, Loot Crate is a monthly subscription box. They make a really awesome, continuously new array of geek-centric and gamer gear, toys, T-shirts, wearable content, collectibles, it's badass. Me and Marisha have been members for years ourselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High-five. There we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: High-five. That was so awkward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was delightfully awkward. That was great. So we announced at the end of the last run with Loot Crate that their new upcoming box is themed "dystopia." It's everything post-apocalyptic, they've had a lot of really awesome Robocop, Terminator 3, Matrix items and Bioshock items--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fallout 4!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --a bunch of really cool things in this next Crate. Plus, on top of the previous stuff we've offered, they also put out what's called a DX Box, this Dystopia DX. Which is a special, premium box which contains over $100 in items into it, it's for the really hardcore awesome collectors out there. And the box itself is a lot bigger--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Look at that thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we unboxing? Are we doing this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't let him get ahead of us! Open that thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we just doing the DX?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! I gotta savor this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skeletor! Mine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. no, It said small, it said small, Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skeletor. Mine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Is it Skeletor?! Oh, this one's a small too, on this side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. I guess the girls get to take advantage of the Skeletor shirts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Skeletor voice) I'll get you He-Man! (cackles)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa! That's a rad shirt!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a rad shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's Street Fighter, Street Fighter gym bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to roshambo to see who keeps the shirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having had the pleasure of actually playing Captain America once, this is really awesome, and having voiced Iron Man once, this box is made for me. Now I need to voice Skeletor and I'll be good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, from this month's Loot Crate--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got my Street Fighter gym bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we allowed to open the small one, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heck yeah! Do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's not small. It's more exclusive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did anybody-- who all did voices for Street Fighter? Taliesin did-- You do Street Fighter, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, I got my Street Fighter bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So me and Travis will share this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, Marish. What do we got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is Dragonball, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's Dragonball too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragonball!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's too much good stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you are re-rolling a new character, Grog suffered a stroke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, you're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty fast on that draw. Pretty quick! Watch out for the microphone. I found in here hidden amongst the rest of the big things a really awesome Stan Lee pin, which is badass because years ago, at an Avengers-themed birthday party, we all dressed up, I actually dressed up as Stan Lee, it was a lot of fun--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We got a whole Avengers Last Supper picture with Stan Lee in the middle just going like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was also-- we had a friend who did Jack Kirby and we got a fight sequence going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, me and him fought. You showed up as the Purple Man and you did karaoke to Start Wearing Purple. That was a good night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stan Lee licks every pin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does. Individually. True believers! (slurp noise)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excelsior!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, for those who aren't subscribers, it's awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a gift, man, that is a great gift.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And with a $3 discount, if you multiply that by 12, that's like getting a free Crate every year. I'm just making that up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not good at math so I believe you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. I'd believe that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, if you want to sign up to get the discount, you go to www.lootcrate.com/criticalrole. if you want to sign up for the DX box, for the real collectors out there, that is www.lootcrate.com/criticalroledx.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a link in the chat or something, so that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a link in the chat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll also tweet one out or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll tweet at the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to keep this. And you're not going to tell anyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Are we supposed to give it back? 'Cause that's not happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they might belong to Geek and Sundry, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to be doing cycling interviews with them starting at noon on Thursday, I believe, next week. So check in with GameSpot Thursday next week to have us sit in front of a camera and make complete and utter fools of ourselves, unlike we do here every Thursday. So that'll be a lot of fun. A reminder, me and Marisha are going to be at the Haven Expo convention in Australia beginning of July, so all you Australian folks in the Southern Hemisphere want to come and say hi, we'd love to see you. Comic Con, San Diego Comic Con is coming up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've heard of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. We're going to be there. Looks like we may have a couple panels throughout the week, as well as the main Geek and Sundry panel, so if you guys are planning on coming to that area, keep an eye on the @CriticalRole Twitter, we're going to be announcing those times and rooms when they become available to us, so you can plan to come see us because we'd love to see you out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to be all of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come say hi! As Travis says, "Come give us a squeeze."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come give us a squeeze. We'll be at the convention hall and we'll be over at Petco in both places at different times.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't give me a squeeze, it makes me uncomfortable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It makes me toot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't like being touched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (fart sound) Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no. I just fart every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's impressive, how does that keep happening? All right, Taliesin, your next episode of Signal Boost, I believe your last episode of Signal Boost--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my last episode of Signal Boost?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you're the most interesting man in the world!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You really are, Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one wants you to leave, but you're leaving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really hard to make those episodes and I have to get on with my life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's a cardboard box, please put all your things in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I have to get on with my life, is that what you just said? It's hard to think about 12 things that you legitimately feel passionately about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially when you took four of them on your run. I was really angry about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, dibsies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we have the "Dear Abby" Vox Machina articles still coming up-- we have a new one tomorrow, I believe? Who's up on that one? Do we know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If only that was the case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might be Percy, we'll find out! Tomorrow it'll be a surprise! Go to geekandsundry.com tomorrow to find out whose article it is. Because we don't know! And I think that's it, that's all, unless anyone has anything else they want to announce, or shall we dive into the game for the evening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to announce that I have an egg on my pizza.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was that intentional? Or did it just happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's breakfast pizza, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a mythical thing, you don't question it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love me some breakfast pizza! I didn't know if it was actually breakfast pizza, or he got regular pizza and somehow it got an egg on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like slapstick pizza.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very embarrassed pizza.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm, that's weird. Anyway, let's go ahead and bring it down here, as we return to the realm of Exandria for tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is something happening now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and welcome back, everyone. So, to bring us into tonight's game, let's do a little recap of recent events. This group of intrepid adventurers, Vox Machina, found their way towards the city of Westruun, which had been partially destroyed by the attacks of the Chroma Conclave, a dangerous group of chromatic dragons, very powerful entities that tore through the countryside. In the wake of this destruction, the Herd of Storms, a roving barbaric tribe that Grog once belonged to, swept in and conquered the city of Westruun. They made an accord with the returning black dragon, Umbrasyl, that they would alleviate most of the spoils of their findings toward it and, as such, would not be in conflict with such a powerful and dangerous entity. Vox Machina swung into the town, cut down the rather brutal and ruthless leader, Kevdak, and aided his son, who seemed to be of more honorable mind, Zanror, and Grog himself, to temporarily take the herd in its current state and use this moment to surprise and hopefully take down this ancient black dragon known as Umbrasyl, the Hope Devourer. They set a trap. They sprung it, and kept the dragon close to the ground as long as they could, dealing vast amounts of damage but not enough to stop it as it began to tear through the herd, as well as Vox Machina itself. Vax and Scanlan had, through the use of magic and ingenuity, teleported themselves inside of the dragon. Didn't seem to go as well as they intended, as the dragon took off, leaving a dangling Grog with his axe and chain stuck in its side, flying off towards the high, darkened mountain of Gatshadow. The midair battle ensued as they tried to find ways to carve their way out of the beast. Vax, utilising the embedded arrow hole and loosening the tension of the muscles with the dragon blade at his disposal, Scanlan's technique a little more sensual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fisted it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as we come back, you've all decided to take an evening's rest to recover from this heinous battle that you just suffered. You carved out some elements of Umbrasyl's corpse that were not destroyed by the anger and might of Grog. I believe I told you a tooth count, a blood vial count, what did I not give you from the remains of the black dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what we don't know, Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scales and claws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if I got a tooth count, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you got three vials of Umbrasyl blood, is all we have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a lot of teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was 15 or so, I believe, because a lot of them were destroyed from the perpetual axe smashing in the mouth--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to write them in the bag?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure it was dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, exactly, it was the more important part, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm writing the body parts in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's a dragon kidney stone worth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 teeth--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it turn into a pearl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might do, you know, a diamond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about scales?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, ten dragon claws were harvested from this entity, and about-- and it's going to take you quite a while, you're probably not going to be able to rest if you continue to harvest from the corpse to get scales off of it, at this point, because it's more dragonhide than just scales, you're taking the hide off of it and you're going to need a team of people and an extended period of time to do that well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said I was going to help with the sword, with that process, since I've got it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that does help, it's still going to be-- there's a lot of hide--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (thumps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Umbrasyl's ghost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, ravaging the countryside from the east.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still in the lair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are still in the lair, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have 60 pounds of scales left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This way we can make Umbrasyl black dragon armor!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we can have, yeah, black and white scales.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, but we could make dragonhide-- with dragonhide you could make badass armor, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could have done that ages ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I want some black and white armor. How--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do keep in mind, the Bag of Holding can hold upwards 500 pounds, to the max.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just be aware.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not infinite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was infinite.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, many of the shops that can do that kind of thing are destroyed, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're okay, there's not a bunch of big stuff in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get some, we should get some.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the gold? Did we find out how much gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're about to find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay, I'm definitely doing that while they're working on the dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll work on the scales.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are working on the scales--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to work most of-- I want to take as much as I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of the scales? Okay, that's fine. Hide, dragonhide, we'll say. Scales themselves are just little pieces, used more for alchemical elements, can be removed from hide later, so we'll call it hide. So I want you to go ahead and make an investigation check, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man! Come on 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I believe I was first to the pile. I was looking for what weapons there are and I also want to watch her, very closely, with everything she does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this have to do with dragons? Is it an investigation about dragons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, no, this is more to do with the gold--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about because I'm in a mountain and it's my favored terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your favored terrain, ironically, is not gold, it is mountains. However, when you level up as a ranger, if you choose to, your next favored terrain should be gold. Just as a character choice--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just checking for-- I wanna be sure I'm rolling what I'm supposed to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Ducktales! Woo-ooo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 is all that I rolled, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With a swimming speed of 40 in gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is quite a lot of gold. As you start counting up a section of it, and you being a very, very discerning eye, you're looking upwards of around 78,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but some of this is Westruun's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of this is Westruun's.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is, it is, it is. You know what, I'm going to keep it-- I'm keeping it in a separate stock, because I don't want to take money away from Westruun--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you're aware, that's 1,570 pounds of gold. You can't carry all that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we separated it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we're going to put a marker in it and let Westruun know that this is their gold and then we'll send them up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that's fair! Then they can come back up and get it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they can, 'cause how else are we going to get it to them? I'm just going to take a little bit of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much you taking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What we put in is still down on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much did we put in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should take 10,000.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Higher! Higher!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's Westruun's money!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can let the people decide?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we have spent a lot of our hard-earned cash saving this for them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to need a little bit of that money to fix my gun, too, which is very broken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much do you need, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how broken it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our Heroes' Feasts are 1,000 bucks each--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About how much is 500 pounds worth of gold? Maybe that's a better question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well 50 gold pieces is one pound, so that's about 100 pounds. 5,000 you said? 500? 500 would be, you know, ten pounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need some platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is there platinum in there? We're so greedy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mostly gold. Platinum is not too heavily traded, it's usually more-- there aren't a lot of people in the general town and cityscapes of Westruun, these areas of the country, that carry large volumes of platinum. They're more like inter-country large purchases that are made. Most of this has just been gathered from people's homes, from personal stashes and mercantile store houses, so most of it here is gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much did you say was the total again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 78,000.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like we should take 15 to 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 20% would be 15,000.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We put in a lot of work. If you wanna do more, you can tell the children of Westruun, personally--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to put-- I don't want to put more, I want to take less, honestly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you hate children, Vex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're very dirty, they smell terrible and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it a terrible idea to let the people decide? 'Cause maybe they would give us more?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The people, how? Hold a vote? Do you want this money or do you want us to have it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) I don't know, because maybe some of it may not all be theirs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you pray on it and ask what Sarenrae would do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going to pray over this money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if we ask them, they're just going to argue amongst themselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would ask an entire town to come to a decision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 300 pounds worth of gold. If you were to put that within the Bag of Holding, that's the most you could carry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Bag of Holding, I'll say at this point, would be full.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maxed out? I could do that, plus I could make myself really big for a little bit, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, but that's all we're taking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These people are in need. It's very hard to say, but I don't want people being homeless and we're walking around with a bunch of gold that's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beyond homeless, they're going to probably have to run, so any money we give them will be money they will use to get out of town. To go somewhere else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we sure there's people capable in town to bring back all this money? That we trust?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, if they had enough people and enough wagons. But, however, if we leave all this gold just sitting here, won't brigands come and rob it and pilfer it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. But what are we going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can hide it in some stone shit. Can't you make some stone shit, to hide it? Some sort of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, like a wall or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, like a fake stone wall that they could walk through? I don't know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That only lasts for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Stone Shape like a little. No, Stone Shape's permanent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's instant. You just (impact).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Okay. Stone Shape's permanent, so I could Stone Shape a little cubby and put a little symbol over it so we know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. But hide it well. I'll hide the hole so that we tell them where it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you begin moving and trudging through the gold, as you start moving it into that pile, you also discover 25 pounds' worth of precious gems, most of them cut, some of which are also rough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of them have identifying marks, like wedding rings, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are a number of gems that look like they're part of necklaces or rings, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder why he's asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of gem-encrusted rings that would be very, very beautiful wedding rings if they were utilized, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any particularly small ones? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number that could fit smaller folked fingers

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a sapphire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's about a 400 gold worth sapphire ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Oh! This one's nice!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So note the 25 pounds' worth of gems. You could attempt to ascertain their worth later. You don't have the materials, nor the actual personal knowledge to figure out exactly how much those gems are worth at the moment. You do also find a bunch of art and fine decor, brass and gold statues that were pulled out of homes, some art pieces, silverware--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do some sort of arcana check on some of the stuff? Have we done that already?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the Hunk of Quall. I'll go ahead and, here, I hand Scanlan the Hunk of Quall

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't Quall's Hunk just for Quall's stuff? Or is it for everything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just finds magical things, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought it was just for his special stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It finds things with magical essences.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, she's metaphorically handing you the Quall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, do you want the Hunk of Quall? Do you want to hang onto it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll Quall it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sparks for a second, then goes dark again. Looking at it, it seems like whatever it was designed to find, it has found and expended most of its temporary enchantment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lame.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it doesn't do anything. So then I'll scan through the stuff, looking for magical dope items--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any pretty paintings that grab our attention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some very pretty paintings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not taking any paintings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could roll it up, Grog, it's not your call!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're very heavy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a 14, anyone want to help me look for magical scheisse?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll help, I'll help you look!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's nothing magical here, at all!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, you wanna help?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just look for magical shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm covered in-- I mean, I can--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog? Grog, look for magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh, I rolled a 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) That's better than us! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His large size allows him to push through large swaths of the pile of coins. You do pull through what appears to be a very, very fine ceramic jug that has runes carved along the sides, and it rightfully should have broken under the weight of most of the metal that had been placed upon it or shifted around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's almost all broken anyway.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of us recognise the type of runes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That really seems right up your alley, buddy, but I think--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try reading the runes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yeah, this would be arcana.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just, arcana check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? It's not a specific language, they're all basic magical runes that are used in transmutation magic. You're not too familiar with anything in this realm, but transmutation is the most you can get out of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait, Grog! Grog, come here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Create Water and I fill the jug with water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It explodes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put water into it. It swishes around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I tip it upside down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you tip it upside down, and the water spills out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I shake it? Any more swishing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shake it, you still hear the swishing, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I put my head in the jug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your voice is ringing in your ears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I shake the jug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still hear, around you (sloshing).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this witchcraft? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you hear the ocean, Grog? Do you hear the ocean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (echoes) No, no, no, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bored, Vax starts tossing gold coins off of Grog's junk while it's on there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What! What the hell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're very small.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Come on, let me break it! It's obviously broken.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try taking a sip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, what are you-- You just take it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just seeing if I can just drink anything in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tip it, nothing comes out of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aww. I thought something cool was going to happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you reach your hand in it, can you touch the bottom of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you feel the bottom. It's all dry ceramic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take the jug. I'm going to put some of the dragon blood that's drying out in the jug and swirl it around a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It swishes around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And pour it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It pours onto the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just blood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scoop up a little bit of dirt and I put the dirt in the jug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have dirt in the jug

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dump it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a filthy jug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I put some semen in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's the magic!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally some sailors that are at sea? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A baby comes out. Now this is your responsibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to the docks of Emon. No. You'll have to take some time with this to discern what it actually does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll just hang onto it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if it's just like a Jug of Holding? Like you could just keep putting stuff in it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but everything's been pouring out but there's still something in the bottom of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take it to an expert, we'll find out later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are smarter people than us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also find amongst this chaos a number of glass shards, and you start discerning that there are a number of empty vials that were shattered and broken across the floor in this area and across the coins. A bunch of empty vials.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potions all mixing together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of things that were seemingly recently used in the recovery of the large entity. However, there is one unbroken vial that you see that contains a cloudy grey oil that swishes around on the inside; some of it tends to seep through the glass, almost, and then evaporate instantaneously on touching the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Who wants this creepy looking shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it! Can I? Have I seen anything like this before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dammit. Can I sniff it to get any clues?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sniff it and it smells metallic, strangely, as you pull the stopper off. It's not liquid, it's more like a thick oil. It's very viscous and slowly swishes in place as you rotate the glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet Gilmore would know what that was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hang onto this for now. It might be massage oil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You never know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find another unbroken-- the glass itself is cracked a little bit, but it's still intact-- what appears to be a small brown, silver and gray layered liquid. It's like three different layers that are all sediment and separate from each other, based on how it's been laying there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ahh! Should we put this inside another glass container so if it breaks, it's okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, I think just putting it in the biological--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Bag of Colding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --the Bag of Colding. Might be wise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Layered gray-brown potion is what I'm writing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got layers of brown, silver and grey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So mostly grey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a birthday cake shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. And then as you push the last of the coins in this hole that you've made in the side of the wall to hide it out of the way, you do also find at the very bottom of this what looks like an old book of some kind, like a tome, it's about this big with a heavy thick leather binding around it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we read it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, this could be the spellbook.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Dres Vina's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dres Vina's spellbook?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Abjurist Noja's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Abjurist Noja, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Abjurist Noja's. Does it look like a spellbook? Have we seen a spellbook before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you read through, the first page has a large title across the top that says: "Tome of Leadership and Influence."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is special.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is! Who should read it? I want to read it right now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, only some of us can read, no offense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck off. Are there any pictures in the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no pictures, it is pure text. Your favorite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Completely worthless. It's awful cold--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Grog looks at it, does it reassemble itself in stick figures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's interesting. You look at the pages, and the lines don't make sense to you but for some reason you understand the gist of what the content is. It goes beyond the barrier of language and, for a second, it's almost like there are pictures, but the pictures are assembled by a bunch of tiny lines in a row and different shapes that show you what it means!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, it's a book about leadership, clearly it wants to communicate something to me--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Intelligence--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Intelligence, right, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like the Grognak comic book in Fallout, is what this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, I was going to say How to Win Friends and Influence People.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As the unofficial leader of the group--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? Really Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --I don't really need the book. So perhaps Percy should look at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking perhaps Keyleth might actually--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not leading anyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, you wanna trade the book for this stupid vase?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I guess because I happen to be holding the vase at the time, sure. No you can-- you can have it

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can have the book?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you can have the vase.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what's the book? The book is Leadership and what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leadership and Influence. If you guys want to take the evening to kind of look over these items, you could probably discern most of the nature of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well, let's do that. Let's take a look at them overnight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to continue eviscerating a dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're exhausted and there's still plenty of hide to pull off of, but it would take you a week and you can notice the more you go, the scent is changing. It's almost like the acidic contents of the body are beginning to accelerate decomposition. It is actually, essentially, now that the body is no longer living, the acidic bile that it usually utilizes as a weapon is slowly consuming its remains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm perfectly content with 40.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we can make a decent amount of armor with 40 pounds--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So whoever wants to carry that, because it's got to be carried, because the Bag of Holding is full.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can carry some. I'm strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much does the biological bag hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The biological bag holds 100 pounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could put some in there. I don't have very much in here. It's all light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 40 pounds? I'll mark that down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 40 pounds of black dragon hide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're carrying around 100 pounds of shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's magic, it's weightless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Bag of Colding. The bag itself weighs five pounds to her, but can contain 100 pounds. So, as you guys work through the evening, who's looking over which items? Who's looking over the book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking over the book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you stand up there and get me the vase?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the vase for Grog--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there other things to look at? I'll look at the vial that I have, the layered one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gimme. Gimme!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit and try and get my gun working again--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're no good for me, but I think last week you said something about spears or javelins or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are various basic weapons in there, but nothing that comes across as anything beyond well-crafted weaponry that was gathered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There any shortswords in the pile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple. A lot of them have been dinged up and wrecked but there are two regular shortswords that seem to be functional and not damaged too heavily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scoop them up

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So two shortswords.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how I even feel about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Percy? The level of broken that Bad News is would require a workshop of some kind. Even just basic blacksmithing tools--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to use the workshop that's in the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, if you guys want to go and rest in the house, then that's doable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm doing the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all of you hop into Scanlan's Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Chicken!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get yourself a delightful chicken dinner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know what that spell is, you just pass through walls like a ghost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through walls and stuff, yeah. So what's that deal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is +2 to charisma, permanently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is fucking brilliant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody need-- Who's shit at climbing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait a minute! Am I shit at climbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, your strength's pretty high. You can rock climb.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm strong!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's based on strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Climbing is, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're shit at climbing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, hey, by the way. Take your fucking shoes off and give them back to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh what, these fabulous shoes that fit me perfectly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, give them to me or I'll just take them while you're sleeping, easily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think you could do that, like I wouldn't notice you sneaking up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So fucking easily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep your boots, then. See if they're there in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As you all find yourselves to rest within the confines, the comfortable confines, of Scanlan's mansion, Percy, I want you to go ahead and make a tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's tinkering is plus four, plus proficiency bonus, plus a d20, if I recall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's proficiency bonus, plus your dex for the purposes of fixing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll rest up but we'll say for the purposes of this you've only regained two hit dice for the evening's rest, of your spent hit dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So I'm just down two hit dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gun is fixed, the materials that you were required to use will cost you half as much as the actual weapon is worth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lord almighty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, let me look at my list here for that-- It's going to come to roughly 400 gold in materials to repair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought it was a more expensive gun than that, I feel a little better. Oh, that's right, it's the cheap gun of the two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the Bad News? You broke that one too, didn't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was Bad News. The other gun was working. I broke it but it was just jammed. Bad News was like (creaking).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the evening's rest goes relatively uneventful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So in the middle of the night, I'd like to swing by the kitchen--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sleep like, you know how little kids sleep with their butts in the air and their feet are tucked under them? That's how I'm-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to check the door for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not very high. Oh, no, yes it is. It's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it does not appear to be trapped, however it is locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'd like to pick that lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I notice this happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30. You're sleeping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I have a really good passive perception, bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, 30 on the trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, on the lock you mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the lock, yeah-- I'd like to sneak in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up in what little bit of low firelight is coming from a distant fireplace in the far corner that's down to very, very simple embers, you see drifting in a semi-circle around the bed, ten spiritual servants, all arms crossed, just staring right at you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Protecting her feet, right? That was the command.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Protect her feet. That was the command.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk in. They're not on her feet. I want nothing to do with her feet, guys, I just want those shoes that she's hugging.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I have the shoes on my feet--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said you were hugging them up here like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no. I said I'm sleeping with my feet tucked up under me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like how? Like Cirque du Soleil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like child's pose, Like child's pose! Yoga, bitch! You know what I'm talking about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With your feet here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Like this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what you said!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here I'll show you. Sorry, guys, you don't get to see-- But it's like this, Liam--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's so vulgar!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, guys, this is a little bit of family trouble, just give me a minute. And I leap on top of her, I take the cup of water and I splash it in her face and I throw flour on her face like that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! What the fuck?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me my boots! Give me my boots! You give me my damn boots! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are immediately pulled off of the bed, slammed onto the ground on the floor--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't get to roll?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --as all the spirits hold you down. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No dexterity, no nothing?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because the moment that you go ahead and splash the water and go towards her, they're on top of you, this isn't about dodging--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I left her feet alone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. What's happening? Don't attack him! Don't attack him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It was less of you trying to avoid and more to see if they could grab you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're vaulted off and slammed onto the ground and they're just holding you there. Not attacking you, they're just holding you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me my boots, you greedy shitbird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? You think I was really going to keep them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want them now. I don't trust you as far as I can throw you. I want you to-- just keep holding me up, guys. I want you to put them on my feet now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they look so good on me. And your feet are so smelly! Are you-- are you mad?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I gave up my life for you. I will have my shoes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should cap 'em, right boys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think any of my servants are boys? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I assume they have both sets of parts, actually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I suppose I could part with them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. Ahh! I'm not putting them on your feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right here. I'll give you these boots if you tell me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could rescind my deal with an all-powerful deity and let you fall to the ground or you could hear about my personals. What's your choice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me my fucking boots!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You love her? You love her so much. Take one, right here. You could put it on, cover up at least one foul stench in the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I can't because they're holding me around the arms--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the servants take the boot from her and start putting it on your feet. Kind of polish it a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she feel the same way about you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ask her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Maybe I will. Fine. Here's your other boot. Servants--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They take it and they hold you down even still forcefully, grab your other leg and gingerly put the other boot on. Polish it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) I love you, but you are a terrible person. And I walk out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) And you walk away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (coughs) I spend 15 minutes getting all the flour off of my bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to Scanlan. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I hear you had a hot spring, or something like that? Or like a spa here? I feel like you'd have a spa-- Because I am covered in dragon bile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, yes. Well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not. no, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just, can you point me in the direction of the spa?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm not coming with you. Don't worry, darling. Yes, it's downstairs in the third basement-- I don't know! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a (stone shifting) shift as a third basement is created in the bottom of the mansion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right next to the boiler room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another shake as a boiler room has now apparated right next--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a very fantastic bathhouse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not bad, actually. It's a fine natural hot spring, a comfortable hot tub temperature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got Russian temperature, Swedish temperature, Finnish temperature--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over the comms and I say: hey, Vex, Pike, I think I just found the new hangout spot for the ladies--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the third basement, come down!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a third basement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the third basement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we can all hear you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah we can all hear you. You can't just pick people, you are aware of that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I mean. Shit! Uh. This is not Keyleth, this is another transmission you're picking up, it's-- I'll change the channel

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Party down in the third basement!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's go down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all going down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not covering anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. It's decorative. As soon as you all sink in this moment, the door opens behind you as Percy and Grog come storming in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit yeah! CANNONBALL!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, this was peaceful--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heh! Look at Scanlan's wiener in that picture. (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cannonball in too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike jumps in--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking off my glasses and going to go soak in a corner quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go find Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys have made your way comfortable into the hot spring. Vex saunters over to you with a look of intention on her face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look so intent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Do you like the hot springs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love the hot springs, aren't they fantastic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do too. I sit down next to her. So my brother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on with you guys? Because I just asked him and he got

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wow, you just said a lot of things in a very short space of time. You know, we just killed a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just killed a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I feel so alive!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So that's about as far as I got. I wasn't sure if I was going to, you know, live past that. I wasn't sure if he was going to live past that. I wasn't sure if you were going to live past that. Really, any of us--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah we did, we did. Now there's three more. And I have a lot that I still have to do and still have to figure out about myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do you like him? Do you love him? That's an answer, you can just answer it, it's not a big deal, you just say yes or no--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) I'm afraid what will happen if I say yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't think about the fear. Think about what you're feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I think that's a yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you hate me if I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sure? Because I kind of thought you might for a very long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know. I thought I might as well, but here's the thing. We've been through a lot. We face death on a very regular basis. (sighs) And I see the way he looks at you, and I see the way you look at him. And happiness is fleeting in this world; we don't know when it will end. Take advantage of it while you can. And stop living in fear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we're not people who are allowed happiness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's bullshit, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what happens if I lose either of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you go on. You can't think about that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've been to the other side. What did you see? Anything? Is there an afterlife?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I wasn't there for very long, but I think there can be. My brother serves Death, Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And death is a natural thing that happens with or without him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you believe in the gods? Do you believe that Vax actually serves Death?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Yes I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you think that means for the rest of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it means that-- I think it means that what we do has a purpose. Regardless of the outcome, there is a purpose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't think we're just destroying everything, everywhere we go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Are you kidding? We saved an entire town today! More dragons may come, but for the time being, people are safe, and we are safe. If we are successful, we could save this entire fucking world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I don't know if I'm cut out to be a hero.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You already are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans) I don't know about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anyway. Be happy. Go to him. Just live in the moment, don't worry about it right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe there's another time and another place where we don't have to. But now I feel like we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in a mansion right now. Fucking cannonball! And I get up and I cannonball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big splash. Hot water across your face--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four and a half!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I need a higher-- I need a broom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Servants come by and fill your goblets that they brought you, with wine, because, drinking in hot tubs, what could possibly go wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you just cannonball away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all do it, we all do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we have a cannonball contest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Breathing Underwater on myself and I just sink to the bottom of the pool and I just stay there for a really long time at the bottom of the pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have Water Breathing prepared? Or was this your Alter Self gills?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alter Self! Yeah, totally! Gills. I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the sides of Keyleth's throat just sprout gills suddenly and naturally and she sinks underneath

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Keyleth! No! No! And I run over and pick her up off the bottom, which is essentially suffocating her, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog pulls you out of the water and shakes you abruptly

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wha--! Ow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back under.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just let myself sink again (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a side note, I have an earring as well and I heard everyone go down into the hot springs so I went back to the kitchen and got some of that chicken sorbet that they make here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's delicious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I went back to my sister's room and I pulled the blanket down and I just smeared it all along the inside of the bed. And then I bring up the blanket and tuck it in nice. It looks perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ten servants watch the whole thing and just nod, well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's disgusting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They had their orders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are the worst of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goodnight boy-girls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (husky voice) Goodnight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, is Percy in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Percy's in the water with you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got in? No, he went into the corner?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you do a cannonball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I do not cannonball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cannonball, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not cannonball!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't wear my glasses, I'm going to hit something and I'm just going to bleed everywhere

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A cannonball contest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to do a cannonball contest?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do a cannonball contest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine. If there's a dare involved, that's completely different.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How much money should we put on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about five pounds of gems?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Do we all have that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I have it and I'll put it in the middle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Five pounds of gems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five pounds of gems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just got Donald Ducked, guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! Oh Scanlan! Your painting! Your painting is not accurate, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they run out of paint, is that what happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, the rules: Everyone gets one jump to be officiated by--? Who? Sarenrae?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody has to-- by your servants.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'll join this. I swim back up to the top to join.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you officiate? Are you going to join or are you in too much of a funk to?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Be fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But vote for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's up first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alphabetical order.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Keyleth. You go ahead and swim up, take some time back, rush forward, leap. Make an--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've had a short rest, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Acrobatics check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a jump, leap and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad. 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She jumps into the air, seemingly weightless--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And in midair, I use my bonus action to turn into an earth elemental!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns into an almost literal cannonball, displaces enough water to the point where the actual water level in the hot spring, now, is about two inches lower than it was before--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on, motherfucker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I come out. Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was good, that was good, that was good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I send a servant. I tell them what it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we refill the pool after each use? Is it magical enough to where we can refill the pool?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, there's a trickle--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, it's my turn! Do a little stretching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have your gauntlets on or not?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're just like--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Naked with gauntlets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not wearing anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you can't see her naughty bits because they glow with heavenly light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here come the artists!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sound of 10,000 pens hitting paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looms up, gets a good distance, turns around, focuses, leaps. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Squash that! Ooh, snip diggity!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike's much smaller form managed to displace about as much as an earth elemental would. Water goes flying out, spraying you guys. The water itself takes a while to actually calm down again--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoa, that was a big one! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's up next?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not done, I'm still working on something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a pot and some cloth, and a whole thing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm the only one that's left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm here too! L, M, N, P, Q, R, S. That's me! Oh boy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry I jumped you, Percy-- He was gone, that's why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a flying leap and jump in while cannonballing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the water comes rushing back, slapping into you, Scanlan, after the fact but, nevertheless, a very impressive display.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why, thank you. Take a bow, take a bow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job, good job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. Percy, are you back yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are aware of what will happen when I hit the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, cool. I grab the kettle. I put it to my chest. I take a run, and I leap into--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't this is detrimental to your health?!

lines.name: PERCY
lines.text: Yes, this is a terrible idea. Do not do this. Do not do this. You will die. And I take a run and jump head into the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Percy, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not acrobatics? Athletics. 23

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, okay. So, as you land and hit the water, there's a momentary pause, a little (sploosh, explosion sound). A secondary explosion that sounds dulled and covered until it hits the air in a loud cacophonous (explosion sound). Water and smoke and pieces of metal go flying as the kettle is destroyed. You, Percy, suffer--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should have mostly directed down but I'm aware that some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. 23 points of bludgeoning and piercing damage from shrapnel and pieces of metal that have just scattered across your chest but nevertheless, a very impressive display.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For science!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Total Party Kill cannonball!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was very impressive, all of you. I'm very impressed. It seems that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The twins!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The twins haven't gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh! I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all right, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. Get it. Go do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I take my broom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the bellyflop--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? I fly 20 feet up. As high as the ceiling. How high is the ceiling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not that high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get to the top of the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's about 15, 20 feet up from the water's surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I stand up on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ceiling's right above you. You're having to hunch forward a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And right as I cannonball off of the broom, I release Trinket out of the necklace too so (shouting) double cannonball!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you leap off, make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man. I thought that was going to be good. Me and Trinket kind of suck. What is that, strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Impressive, a very impressive display.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Impressive. And she didn't really use magic, so that's good. Bonus points there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growl, shaking coat sound) Shakes off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the judging of this up to artistic interpretation, like ice skating?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's up to Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done, all around. Really, I'm really quite impressed. However, there was only one--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hang on. He still has to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's not in the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's not in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, wait. Is Vax going to do it? Is he coming down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he stealthing right now and he's actually in the room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (applause)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well met, well met. Five pounds of gems?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He needs it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and smiles as the blood slowly runs from one nostril-- (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those gems are going to turn into lead, aren't they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got plans for one of them--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the gems in one hand, takes the towel, wraps it around as he steps out of the water with the other and makes his way outside of the spa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good game, good game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm going to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys go, find your way to your respective rooms, rest for the remainder of the evening. Wake up to the smell of wonderfully cooked chicken wafting through the hallways of the mansion. The only person that has a unique evening's sleeping is Vex, who slides into her comfortable, silk sheet bed to a (sucking sound) to find some sort of now chilled but loosely room-temperature chicken paste--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is just disgusting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you mean, that's fowl? (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Fowl!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even care. Trinket loves it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket is all over that. Trinket is now just lapping it up from the inside of the bed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I just go to sleep and I'll take a shower in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You all wake up. Breakfast is at your disposal. You begin to eat comfortably, you wash up, Vex--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else you wish to achieve here or shall we continue with the rest of your journey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've learned about the book that we found from the dragon. It is filled with knowledge that can increase someone's abilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What abilities?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The abilities that I happen to be very good at would be even better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want any part of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not my sex abilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, oh. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My sex ability--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What abilities? (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charismatic abilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it just gives you, you have all the charisma?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Permanently better charisma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Keyleth, as you make that awkward-ass face, maybe you should improve your charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You smell like chicken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know who it could be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to get out of this mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I also went to my room and I was like "Man, what I could really--" and I was holding the jug, at the time, and I was like, "I'm just going to break it, nobody'll know--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll be great. And I was like, "I could really go for some

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a never-ending beer jug?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, it's not never-ending. It stopped after a bit. But I got plenty fucking wasted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it just beer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it just beer? Or is it any spirit? Or what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (disconcerted oohs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a jug of mayonnaise now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the wee hours of the morning--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's chicken!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was one of the best exchanges of our entire run!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't stop laughing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what else? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No mayonnaise!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beer. Send beer, is fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that one brought tears.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Please somebody draw him just sad in his room eating mayonnaise--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scooping mayonnaise out of a jar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A Grecian urn of mayonnaise.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, my tears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saddest Winnie the Pooh ever--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can pass through walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone who drinks it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that would be good for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, less drinking. More like applying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's rubbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's an oil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, don't drink it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would not recommend drinking it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can rub it on your back for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you have to rub it on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd need to use a stepping stool to do it, but you could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other one was a Potion of Climbing, which we decided--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does Pike want it? Oh, you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I suck at it, but anybody else can have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you have a broom? You ain't going to be climbing much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true! I don't need it. I have a broom!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I might take it. High ground is occasionally very useful for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a broom that flies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm not that strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the name of that tome again, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tome of Leadership and Influence. I'm torn, Keyleth. You have some charisma issues, shall we say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. No, keep telling me about myself, Scanlan, today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm just saying that I am quite self-confident, sure of myself. Some would say charming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some. Not most.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this book would make me unstoppably so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, I don't know, we could roshambo for it? What does the group think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think Keyleth should read it. She's trying to lead her people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Roshambo for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to-- what? I don't like wanting things. I don't care, you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who has-- This is-- who has charisma-based spells?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a big fat pause, is what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we think on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, we'll think on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, it takes days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes six days of reading to take effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. So if you read for two days and then pass it off to someone else, does it just restart?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's once a century it works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! Once a century?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a similar book, that I used--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you use it on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can have it nexties! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually a very fair point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
